name: Call to Valhalla
description:
Ever since Polygar was a young viking, he felt the urge to venture beyond the waves. He sought to achieve glory through discovering a new world. Gather wood, kill Draugr and sail your ship on the ocean! Explore the new world with magical beasts and sarcastic Gods.

This was a game I made for a university project. If you enjoy it, feel free to donate to my Paypal at paypal.me/DarthMurky to support me in my studies :). Have a great day ^^
